name: v0.0.6
body:
## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 6 or greater

1. (Bazel 6 only) Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc`.
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "package_metadata", version = "0.0.6")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE.bazel` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "package_metadata",
    sha256 = "5bd0cc7594ea528fd28f98d82457f157827d48cc20e07bcfdbb56072f35c8f67",
    strip_prefix = "supply-chain-0.0.6/metadata",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/supply-chain/releases/download/v0.0.6/supply-chain-v0.0.6.tar.gz",
)
```


## What's Changed
* [metadata] licenses: add `license_kind` rule and provider by @Yannic in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/supply-chain/pull/13
* Add high-level documentation by @Yannic in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/supply-chain/pull/15
* [release] Configure `publish-to-bcr` with multiple module roots by @Yannic in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/supply-chain/pull/16
* [docs] Document concepts of `@package_metadata` by @Yannic in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/supply-chain/pull/17
* [lib] Initial implementation of `Go` library for reading package metadata by @Yannic in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/supply-chain/pull/8
* [metadata] Initial implementation of `license` rule by @Yannic in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/supply-chain/pull/18
* [go] Add BCR release template by @Yannic in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/supply-chain/pull/20
* [bcr] Add `@supply-chain-go` to `moduleRoots` by @Yannic in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/supply-chain/pull/21
* Create release automation by @Yannic in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/supply-chain/pull/22
* [release] Fix name of `ci.yml` by @Yannic in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/supply-chain/pull/23
* chore: Configure Renovate by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/supply-chain/pull/19
* chore(deps): update bazel-contrib/publish-to-bcr action to v0.2.2 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/supply-chain/pull/26
* chore(deps): update bazel-contrib/.github action to v7.2.2 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/supply-chain/pull/25
* chore(deps): update dependency bazel_skylib to v1.8.0 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/supply-chain/pull/28
* chore(deps): update dependency gazelle to v0.44.0 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/supply-chain/pull/29
* chore(deps): update dependency rules_go to v0.55.1 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/supply-chain/pull/30
* [ci] Add step to report overall status by @Yannic in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/supply-chain/pull/31
* chore(deps): update dependency bazel_skylib to v1.8.1 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/supply-chain/pull/33
* [release] Configure git author and committer by @Yannic in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/supply-chain/pull/24
* [lib] go: fix path of module by @Yannic in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/supply-chain/pull/35
* Update README by @aiuto in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/supply-chain/pull/34
* [metadata] Add util for construcing `purl`s for BCR packages by @Yannic in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/supply-chain/pull/32
* [release] Don't create draft PRs in BCR by @Yannic in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/supply-chain/pull/39
* Make gitignore more inclusive by @aiuto in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/supply-chain/pull/40
* chore(deps): update bazel-contrib/.github action to v7.2.3 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/supply-chain/pull/36
* chore(deps): update dependency rules_go to v0.56.1 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/supply-chain/pull/45
* chore(deps): update actions/checkout action to v5 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/supply-chain/pull/49
* chore(deps): update dependency gazelle to v0.45.0 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/supply-chain/pull/46
* chore(deps): update dependency rules_go to v0.57.0 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/supply-chain/pull/52
* Initial version of tools to gather package metadata. by @aiuto in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/supply-chain/pull/41
* chore(deps): update bazel-contrib/publish-to-bcr action to v0.2.3 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/supply-chain/pull/54
* fix(deps): update module github.com/stretchr/testify to v1.11.0 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/supply-chain/pull/53
* fix(deps): update module github.com/stretchr/testify to v1.11.1 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/supply-chain/pull/55
* Start framework to call SBOM generator by @aiuto in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/supply-chain/pull/56
* Bugfix: gather 'applicable_licenses' when 'package_metadata' is missing by @TheGrizzlyDev in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/supply-chain/pull/58
* Fix some old refs to rules_license. by @aiuto in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/supply-chain/pull/57
* Format everything by @Yannic in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/supply-chain/pull/59
* Fix MODULE dev dependencies by @aiuto in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/supply-chain/pull/60
* chore(deps): update dependency rules_cc to v0.2.2 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/supply-chain/pull/62
* chore(deps): update dependency rules_python to v1.5.4 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/supply-chain/pull/61
* chore(deps): update dependency rules_cc to v0.2.3 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/supply-chain/pull/67
* chore(deps): update dependency rules_python to v1.6.0 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/supply-chain/pull/68
* chore(deps): update bazel-contrib/publish-to-bcr action to v1 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/supply-chain/pull/69
* chore(deps): update dependency rules_cc to v0.2.4 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/supply-chain/pull/70
* chore(deps): update dependency rules_python to v1.6.1 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/supply-chain/pull/71
* Fix broken package metadata collector in core.bzl by @aiuto in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/supply-chain/pull/64
* [lib/go] Fix gazelle target name by @Yannic in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/supply-chain/pull/72
* chore(deps): update dependency rules_cc to v0.2.5 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/supply-chain/pull/73
* chore(deps): update dependency rules_cc to v0.2.8 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/supply-chain/pull/74
* [lib/go] Add `Label` and `AttributeKinds` to `PackageMetadata` by @Yannic in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/supply-chain/pull/66
* chore(deps): update dependency rules_python to v1.6.3 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/supply-chain/pull/76
* chore(deps): update dependency bazel_skylib to v1.8.2 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/supply-chain/pull/77
* Add a legacy rules_license example. by @aiuto in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/supply-chain/pull/78
* add missing lib dir by @aiuto in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/supply-chain/pull/80
* [ci] Pin Bazel `rolling` version by @Yannic in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/supply-chain/pull/89
* Fix typos in docs by @Yannic in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/supply-chain/pull/88
* chore(deps): update dependency rules_cc to v0.2.10 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/supply-chain/pull/85
* Update spdx license list by @aiuto in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/supply-chain/pull/86
* export licenses:srcs by @aiuto in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/supply-chain/pull/83
* Define toolchain to override `PackageMetadataInfo` by @Yannic in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/supply-chain/pull/75
* Add CI runner for tools by @aiuto in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/supply-chain/pull/84

## New Contributors
* @renovate[bot] made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/supply-chain/pull/19
* @aiuto made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/supply-chain/pull/34
* @TheGrizzlyDev made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/supply-chain/pull/58

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/supply-chain/compare/v0.0.2...v0.0.6

name: v0.0.1
body:
## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 6 or greater

1. (Bazel 6 only) Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc`.
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "package_metadata", version = "0.0.1")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE.bazel` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "package_metadata",
    sha256 = "7446b71263039c7a5e90c4a069fd4c090e12a1a6c69a20eb4cd76034d610beb6",
    strip_prefix = "supply-chain-0.0.1/metadata",
```

## What's Changed

## New Contributors
